title: USA, Mexico resume soccer rivalry in a Rose Bowl showdown
text: BING NEWS: USA, Mexico resume soccer rivalry in a Rose Bowl showdown PASADENA, Calif. (AP) — Jurgen Klinsmann realizes the Rose Bowl might feel like enemy turf when his U.S. men's soccer team takes the fabled field Saturday night.
